level.text: A supervised practice form shall be submitted two (2) weeks prior to commencement of supervised practice. A supervised practice form may only be issued to an applicant one (1) time. An applicant may practice massage therapy while working under a supervised practice form for no more than ninety (90) days, and may practice at multiple locations at the discretion of the supervisor(s).
A supervisor may supervise no more than three (3) applicants at any one time.
